definitions.definition: A frame composed of two strong oak timbers ( bitt-heads ) fixed vertically in the fore part of a ship , bolted to the deck beams to which are secured the cables when the ship rides to anchor

main_definition: ( nautical , plural only ) A frame composed of two strong oak timbers ( bitt-heads ) fixed vertically in the fore part of a ship , bolted to the deck beams to which are secured the cables when the ship rides to anchor
